question: Sophia is required to submit a 96-page assignment. She already finished writing 1/12 of the assignment. How many pages does she have left to write?
answer:
Sophia has already written 1/12 of the assignment which is 96 pages*1/12 = <<96*1/12=8>>8 pages.
So, she still needs to write 96 pages - 8 pages = <<96-8=88>>88 pages.
#### 88
